definitions.text: a unit of time equal to 60 seconds or 1/60th of an hour

examples: the moment he arrived the party began

definitions.text: a unit of angular distance equal to a 60th of a degree

examples: the secretary keeps the minutes of the meeting

definitions.text: distance measured by the time taken to cover it
examples: we live an hour from the airport
two minute whiplike threads of protoplasm

definitions.text: characterized by painstaking care and detailed examination
examples: a minute inspection of the grounds
